<h3 data-start="128" data-end="160">✅ Your Program’s Main Steps:</h3>
<ol data-start="161" data-end="372">
<li data-start="161" data-end="199">

</li>
<li data-start="200" data-end="243">
<p data-start="203" data-end="243"><strong data-start="203" data-end="243">Open the university gym/pool website</strong></p>
</li>
<li data-start="244" data-end="268">
<p data-start="247" data-end="268"><strong data-start="247" data-end="268">Login (if needed)</strong></p>
</li>
<li data-start="269" data-end="311">
<p data-start="272" data-end="311"><strong data-start="272" data-end="289">Check balance</strong> (if enough, continue)</p>
</li>
<li data-start="312" data-end="337">
<p data-start="315" data-end="337"><strong data-start="315" data-end="337">Select date/ticket</strong></p>
</li>
<li data-start="338" data-end="372">
<p data-start="341" data-end="372"><strong data-start="341" data-end="372">Reserve as fast as possible</strong></p>
</li>
</ol>

4.04235 18.0962 4.40306 18.1289 4.80371C18.1657 5.25395 18.165 5.81091 18.165 6.5V9.33301Z"></path></svg>Copy code</button></div></div></div><div class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="whitespace-pre! language-python"><span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">from</span></span><span> selenium </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">import</span></span><span> webdriver
</span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">from</span></span><span> selenium.webdriver.common.by </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">import</span></span><span> By
</span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">import</span></span><span> time
</span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">import</span></span><span> datetime

</span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># Settings</span></span><span>
target_time = </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"06:59:58"</span></span><span>  </span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># set to a few seconds before opening</span></span><span>
url = </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"https://your-university-site.com/reserve"</span></span><span>

</span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># 1. Wait until target time</span></span><span>
</span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">while</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-literal">True</span></span><span>:
    now = datetime.datetime.now().strftime(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"%H:%M:%S"</span></span><span>)
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> now &gt;= target_time:
        </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">break</span></span><span>
    time.sleep(</span><span><span class="hljs-number">0.1</span></span><span>)

</span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># 2. Start browser</span></span><span>
driver = webdriver.Chrome()  </span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># make sure chromedriver is installed</span></span><span>
driver.get(url)

</span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># 3. Optional: Login</span></span><span>
driver.find_element(By.ID, </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"username"</span></span><span>).send_keys(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"your_id"</span></span><span>)
driver.find_element(By.ID, </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"password"</span></span><span>).send_keys(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"your_pass"</span></span><span>)
driver.find_element(By.ID, </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"login_button"</span></span><span>).click()

</span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># 4. Wait/load and check balance</span></span><span>
time.sleep(</span><span><span class="hljs-number">1</span></span><span>)  </span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># adjust depending on loading time</span></span><span>
balance = driver.find_element(By.ID, </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"balance"</span></span><span>).text
</span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">float</span></span><span>(balance) &gt;= </span><span><span class="hljs-number">5.0</span></span><span>:  </span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># example balance check</span></span><span>
    </span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># 5. Reserve</span></span><span>
    driver.find_element(By.ID, </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"ticket_button"</span></span><span>).click()
    driver.find_element(By.ID, </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"confirm_button"</span></span><span>).click()
    </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">print</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"Reserved successfully!"</span></span><span>)
</span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">else</span></span><span>:
    </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">print</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"Not enough balance."</span></span><span>)
</span></span></code></div></div></pre>
<hr data-start="1845" data-end="1848">
<h3 data-start="1850" data-end="1863">⚠️ Notes:</h3>
<ul data-start="1864" data-end="2212">
<li data-start="1864" data-end="1979">
<p data-start="1866" data-end="1979">Replace element IDs like <code data-start="1891" data-end="1903">"username"</code>, <code data-start="1905" data-end="1921">"login_button"</code>, etc., with actual values (use browser <strong data-start="1961" data-end="1977">Inspect Tool</strong>).</p>
</li>
<li data-start="1980" data-end="2140">
<p data-start="1982" data-end="2140">Selenium needs <code data-start="1997" data-end="2011">chromedriver</code> that matches your Chrome version:<br data-start="2045" data-end="2048">
<a data-start="2050" data-end="2140" rel="noopener" target="_new" class="cursor-pointer">https://chromedriver.chromium.org/downloads</a></p>
</li>
<li data-start="2141" data-end="2212">
<p data-start="2143" data-end="2212">This script <strong data-start="2155" data-end="2211">must run a few seconds before the exact opening time</strong>.</p>
</li>
</ul>
<hr data-start="2214" data-end="2217">
<p data-start="2219" data-end="2326">💡 Want to go stealthier? Use <code data-start="2249" data-end="2274">undetected-chromedriver</code> or headless mode so your browser opens without GUI.</p>
<hr data-start="2328" data-end="2331">
<p data-start="2333" data-end="2367">Let me know if you want help with:</p>
<ul data-start="2368" data-end="2505">
<li data-start="2368" data-end="2404">
<p data-start="2370" data-end="2404">Finding the right HTML element IDs</p>
</li>
<li data-start="2405" data-end="2476">
<p data-start="2407" data-end="2476">Making it run daily automatically (e.g., with Task Scheduler or cron)</p>
</li>
<li data-start="2477" data-end="2505">
<p data-start="2479" data-end="2505">Making it retry on failure</p>
</li>
</ul>

3.94012 6.34668 3.56348L6.46875 3.34473C6.77282 2.84912 7.20856 2.44514 7.72949 2.17969L7.87207 2.11328C8.20855 1.96886 8.56979 1.90385 8.9707 1.87109C9.42091 1.83432 9.978 1.83496 10.667 1.83496H13.5C14.1891 1.83496 14.746 1.83431 15.1963 1.87109C15.6541 1.90851 16.0599 1.98788 16.4365 2.17969L16.6553 2.30176C17.151 2.60585 17.5548 3.04244 17.8203 3.56348L17.8867 3.70606C18.031 4.04235 18.0962 4.40306 18.1289 4.80371C18.1657 5.25395 18.165 5.81091 18.165 6.5V9.33301Z"></path></svg>Copy code</button></div></div></div><div class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="whitespace-pre! language-python"><span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">from</span></span><span> selenium </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">import</span></span><span> webdriver
</span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">from</span></span><span> selenium.webdriver.common.by </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">import</span></span><span> By
</span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">from</span></span><span> selenium.webdriver.chrome.options </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">import</span></span><span> Options
</span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">import</span></span><span> time
</span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">import</span></span><span> datetime

</span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># === SETTINGS ===</span></span><span>
LOGIN_URL = </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"https://your-university-site.com/login"</span></span><span>
RESERVATION_URL = </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"https://your-university-site.com/reserve"</span></span><span>
USERNAME = </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"your_username"</span></span><span>
PASSWORD = </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"your_password"</span></span><span>
TARGET_TIME = </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"06:59:58"</span></span><span>  </span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># a few seconds before opening</span></span><span>
MIN_BALANCE = </span><span><span class="hljs-number">5.0</span></span><span>

</span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># === SETUP SELENIUM ===</span></span><span>
options = Options()
</span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># options.add_argument("--headless")  # Uncomment if you want no window</span></span><span>
driver = webdriver.Chrome(options=options)

</span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># === WAIT UNTIL TARGET TIME ===</span></span><span>
</span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">while</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-literal">True</span></span><span>:
    now = datetime.datetime.now().strftime(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"%H:%M:%S"</span></span><span>)
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> now &gt;= TARGET_TIME:
        </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">break</span></span><span>
    time.sleep(</span><span><span class="hljs-number">0.1</span></span><span>)

</span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># === LOGIN FUNCTION ===</span></span><span>
</span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">def</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-title function_">login</span></span><span>():
    driver.get(LOGIN_URL)
    time.sleep(</span><span><span class="hljs-number">1</span></span><span>)
    driver.find_element(By.ID, </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"username"</span></span><span>).send_keys(USERNAME)
    driver.find_element(By.ID, </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"password"</span></span><span>).send_keys(PASSWORD)
    driver.find_element(By.ID, </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"login_button"</span></span><span>).click()
    time.sleep(</span><span><span class="hljs-number">2</span></span><span>)  </span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># Adjust if your site loads slower</span></span><span>

</span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># === CHECK BALANCE AND RESERVE ===</span></span><span>
</span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">def</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-title function_">reserve_ticket</span></span><span>():
    driver.get(RESERVATION_URL)
    time.sleep(</span><span><span class="hljs-number">1</span></span><span>)
    balance_text = driver.find_element(By.ID, </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"balance"</span></span><span>).text
    balance = </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">float</span></span><span>(balance_text.strip().replace(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"€"</span></span><span>, </span><span><span class="hljs-string">""</span></span><span>).replace(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">","</span></span><span>, </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"."</span></span><span>))  </span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># Adjust if needed</span></span><span>

    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> balance &gt;= MIN_BALANCE:
        driver.find_element(By.ID, </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"ticket_button"</span></span><span>).click()
        driver.find_element(By.ID, </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"confirm_button"</span></span><span>).click()
        </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">print</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"✅ Ticket reserved!"</span></span><span>)
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">else</span></span><span>:
        </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">print</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"❌ Not enough balance."</span></span><span>)

</span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># === RUN ===</span></span><span>
login()
reserve_ticket()
</span></span></code></div></div></pre>
<hr data-start="1943" data-end="1946">
<h3 data-start="1948" data-end="1969">📌 Replace These:</h3>
<ul data-start="1970" data-end="2255">
<li data-start="1970" data-end="2147">
<p data-start="1972" data-end="2147"><code data-start="1972" data-end="1984">"username"</code>, <code data-start="1986" data-end="1998">"password"</code>, <code data-start="2000" data-end="2016">"login_button"</code>, <code data-start="2018" data-end="2029">"balance"</code>, <code data-start="2031" data-end="2048">"ticket_button"</code>, <code data-start="2050" data-end="2068">"confirm_button"</code> with actual <code data-start="2081" data-end="2085">id</code>, <code data-start="2087" data-end="2093">name</code>, or <code data-start="2098" data-end="2105">class</code> values using browser <strong data-start="2127" data-end="2146">Inspect Element</strong>.</p>
</li>
<li data-start="2148" data-end="2255">
<p data-start="2150" data-end="2255">If IDs don’t exist, we can use <code data-start="2181" data-end="2213">.find_element(By.XPATH, "...")</code> or <code data-start="2217" data-end="2254">.find_element(By.CLASS_NAME, "...")</code>.</p>
</li>
</ul>
<hr data-start="2257" data-end="2260">
<p data-start="2262" data-end="2396">💡 Want me to help you inspect the website elements? You can send a screenshot of the login and reservation page (hide personal info).</p>
<p data-start="2398" data-end="2416">Next step? We can:</p>
<ul data-start="2417" data-end="2506">
<li data-start="2417" data-end="2445">
<p data-start="2419" data-end="2445">Auto-run it daily at 06:59</p>
</li>
<li data-start="2446" data-end="2473">

</li>

<p data-start="2476" data-end="2506">Add notification after success</p>
</li>
</ul>

<h3 data-start="121" data-end="155">✅ How We'll Solve the CAPTCHA:</h3>
<ol data-start="156" data-end="341">
<li data-start="156" data-end="223">
<p data-start="159" data-end="223"><strong data-start="159" data-end="188">Read the captcha question</strong> from the site (e.g. <code data-start="209" data-end="222">"5 + 2 = ?"</code>)</p>
</li>
<li data-start="224" data-end="263">
<p data-start="227" data-end="263"><strong data-start="227" data-end="263">Extract the numbers and operator</strong></p>
</li>
<li data-start="264" data-end="291">
<p data-start="267" data-end="291"><strong data-start="267" data-end="291">Solve it with Python</strong></p>
</li>
<li data-start="292" data-end="341">
<p data-start="295" data-end="341"><strong data-start="295" data-end="341">Type the result into the captcha input box</strong></p>
</li>
</ol>

3.94012 6.34668 3.56348L6.46875 3.34473C6.77282 2.84912 7.20856 2.44514 7.72949 2.17969L7.87207 2.11328C8.20855 1.96886 8.56979 1.90385 8.9707 1.87109C9.42091 1.83432 9.978 1.83496 10.667 1.83496H13.5C14.1891 1.83496 14.746 1.83431 15.1963 1.87109C15.6541 1.90851 16.0599 1.98788 16.4365 2.17969L16.6553 2.30176C17.151 2.60585 17.5548 3.04244 17.8203 3.56348L17.8867 3.70606C18.031 4.04235 18.0962 4.40306 18.1289 4.80371C18.1657 5.25395 18.165 5.81091 18.165 6.5V9.33301Z"></path></svg>Copy code</button></div></div></div><div class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="whitespace-pre! language-python"><span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">import</span></span><span> re  </span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># for extracting numbers and symbols</span></span><span>

</span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">def</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-title function_">login</span></span><span>():
    driver.get(LOGIN_URL)
    time.sleep(</span><span><span class="hljs-number">1</span></span><span>)

    </span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># Fill in username and password</span></span><span>
    driver.find_element(By.ID, </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"username"</span></span><span>).send_keys(USERNAME)
    driver.find_element(By.ID, </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"password"</span></span><span>).send_keys(PASSWORD)

    </span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># --- Handle CAPTCHA ---</span></span><span>
    captcha_text = driver.find_element(By.ID, </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"captcha_question"</span></span><span>).text  </span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># e.g. "5 + 2 = ?"</span></span><span>
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">match</span></span><span> = re.findall(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">r'\d+|\+|\-'</span></span><span>, captcha_text)  </span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># extract ['5', '+', '2']</span></span><span>
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">len</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">match</span></span><span>) == </span><span><span class="hljs-number">3</span></span><span>:
        num1 = </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">int</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">match</span></span><span>[</span><span><span class="hljs-number">0</span></span><span>])
        operator = </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">match</span></span><span>[</span><span><span class="hljs-number">1</span></span><span>]
        num2 = </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">int</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">match</span></span><span>[</span><span><span class="hljs-number">2</span></span><span>])
        result = num1 + num2 </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> operator == </span><span><span class="hljs-string">'+'</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">else</span></span><span> num1 - num2
        driver.find_element(By.ID, </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"captcha_answer"</span></span><span>).send_keys(</span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">str</span></span><span>(result))
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">else</span></span><span>:
        </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">print</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"❌ Failed to parse captcha."</span></span><span>)
        </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">return</span></span><span>

    </span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># Submit the form</span></span><span>
    driver.find_element(By.ID, </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"login_button"</span></span><span>).click()
    time.sleep(</span><span><span class="hljs-number">2</span></span><span>)
</span></span></code></div></div></pre>
<hr data-start="1324" data-end="1327">
<h3 data-start="1329" data-end="1353">📌 Update These IDs:</h3>
<p data-start="1354" data-end="1362">Replace:</p>
<ul data-start="1363" data-end="1469">
<li data-start="1363" data-end="1416">
<p data-start="1365" data-end="1416"><code data-start="1365" data-end="1385">"captcha_question"</code> → the element showing the math</p>
</li>
<li data-start="1417" data-end="1469">
<p data-start="1419" data-end="1469"><code data-start="1419" data-end="1437">"captcha_answer"</code> → the input box for your answer</p>
</li>
</ul>
<p data-start="1471" data-end="1558">Use browser <strong data-start="1483" data-end="1499">Inspect Tool</strong> to find the correct <code data-start="1520" data-end="1524">id</code>, <code data-start="1526" data-end="1533">class</code>, or use XPath if needed:</p>
<pre class="overflow-visible!" data-start="1559" data-end="1645"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-2xl relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary"><div class="flex items-center class="whitespace-pre! language-python"><span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> operator == </span><span><span class="hljs-string">'+'</span></span><span>:
    result = num1 + num2
</span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">elif</span></span><span> operator == </span><span><span class="hljs-string">'-'</span></span><span>:
    result = num1 - num2
</span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">elif</span></span><span> operator == </span><span><span class="hljs-string">'*'</span></span><span>:
    result = num1 * num2
</span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">elif</span></span><span> operator == </span><span><span class="hljs-string">'/'</span></span><span>:
    result = num1 // num2
</span></span></code></div></div></pre>
<hr data-start="1937" data-end="1940">
<p data-start="1942" data-end="2028" data-is-last-node="" data-is-only-node="">Want to show me a sample of the captcha or HTML? I’ll help you lock this down solid 🔒</p></div></div></div></div><div class="flex min-h-[46px] justify-start"><div class="touch:-me-2 touch:-ms-3.5 -ms-2.5 -me-1 flex flex-wrap items-center gap-y-4 p-1 data-scroll-anchor="false"><h6 class="sr-only">ChatGPT said:</h6><div class="text-base my-auto mx-auto py-5 [--thread-content-margin:--spacing(4)] @[37rem]:[--thread-content-margin:--spacing(6)] @[72rem]:[--thread-content-margin:--spacing(16)] px-(--thread-content-margin)"><div class="[--thread-content-max-width:32rem] @[34rem]:[--thread-content-max-width:40rem] @[64rem]:[--thread-content-max-width:48rem] mx-auto flex max-w-(--thread-content-max-width) flex-1 text-base gap-4 md:gap-5 lg:gap-6 group/turn-messages focus-visible:outline-hidden" tabindex="-1"><div class="group/conversation-turn relative flex w-full min-w-0 flex-col agent-turn"><div class="relative flex-col gap-1 md:gap-3"><div class="flex max-w-full flex-col grow"><div data-message-author-role="assistant" data-message-id="a9d4f663-bc4f-4d31-9259-dd9d487a035b" dir="auto" class="min-h-8 text-message relative flex w-full flex-col items-end gap-2 text-start break-words whitespace-normal [.text-message+&amp;]:mt-5" data-message-model-slug="gpt-4o"><div class="flex w-full flex-col gap-1 empty:hidden first:pt-[3px]"><div class="markdown prose dark:prose-invert w-full break-words dark"><p data-start="0" data-end="15">Great question.</p>
<p data-start="17" data-end="81">👉 <strong data-start="20" data-end="81">This code reads the CAPTCHA from text, not from an image.</strong></p>
<hr data-start="83" data-end="86">
<h3 data-start="88" data-end="130">✅ It works <strong data-start="103" data-end="114">only if</strong> the CAPTCHA is:</h3>
<ul data-start="131" data-end="252">
<li data-start="131" data-end="211">
<p data-start="133" data-end="211">Displayed as <strong data-start="146" data-end="161">normal text</strong> in HTML (like: <code data-start="177" data-end="190">"5 + 2 = ?"</code> visible on the page)</p>
</li>
<li data-start="212" data-end="252">
<p data-start="214" data-end="252">Not embedded inside an image or canvas</p>
</li>
</ul>
<p data-start="254" data-end="280">You can check this easily:</p>
<ol data-start="281" data-end="515">
<li data-start="281" data-end="310">
<p data-start="284" data-end="310">Right-click on the CAPTCHA</p>
</li>
<li data-start="311" data-end="331">
<p data-start="314" data-end="331">Click <strong data-start="320" data-end="331">Inspect</strong></p>
</li>
<li data-start="332" data-end="429">
<p data-start="335" data-end="429">If the numbers (like "5 + 2") are inside a tag like <code data-start="387" data-end="411">&lt;span&gt;5 + 2 = ?&lt;/span&gt;</code> → <strong data-start="414" data-end="429">you’re good</strong></p>
</li>
<li data-start="430" data-end="515">
<p data-start="433" data-end="515">If it’s a <code data-start="443" data-end="468">&lt;img src="captcha.png"&gt;</code> or <code data-start="472" data-end="482">&lt;canvas&gt;</code> → then it’s <strong data-start="495" data-end="515">an image CAPTCHA</strong></p>
</li>
</ol>
<hr data-start="517" data-end="520">
<h3 data-start="522" data-end="553">❌ If It’s an Image CAPTCHA:</h3>
<p data-start="554" data-end="568">You’d need to:</p>
<ul data-start="569" data-end="714">
<li data-start="569" data-end="609">
<p data-start="571" data-end="609">Take a screenshot of the image element</p>
</li>
<li data-start="610" data-end="698">
<p data-start="612" data-end="698">Use <strong data-start="616" data-end="623">OCR</strong> (Optical Character Recognition), like with <code data-start="667" data-end="680">pytesseract</code>, to read the math</p>
</li>
<li data-start="699" data-end="714">
<p data-start="701" data-end="714">Then solve it</p>
</li>
</ul>
<p data-start="716" data-end="744">Example (for image CAPTCHA):</p>
<pre class="overflow-visible!" data-start="745" data-end="1093"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-2xl relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary"><div class="flex items-center class="whitespace-pre! language-python"><span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">from</span></span><span> PIL </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">import</span></span><span> Image
</span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">import</span></span><span> pytesseract

</span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># Locate and save captcha image</span></span><span>
captcha_element = driver.find_element(By.ID, </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"captcha_img"</span></span><span>)
captcha_element.screenshot(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"captcha.png"</span></span><span>)

</span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># Read image with OCR</span></span><span>
captcha_image = Image.</span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">open</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"captcha.png"</span></span><span>)
captcha_text = pytesseract.image_to_string(captcha_image)

</span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># Extract and solve math as before</span></span><span>
</span></span></code></div></div></pre>

class="whitespace-pre! language-python"><span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">import</span></span><span> re  </span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># should be imported at top</span></span><span>

</span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># --- CAPTCHA solving ---</span></span><span>
captcha_text = driver.find_element(By.ID, </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"captcha_question"</span></span><span>).text  </span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># Change ID if needed</span></span><span>
</span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">match</span></span><span> = re.findall(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">r'\d+|\+|\-'</span></span><span>, captcha_text)  </span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># Extract ['8', '-', '3']</span></span><span>

</span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">len</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">match</span></span><span>) == </span><span><span class="hljs-number">3</span></span><span>:
    num1 = </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">int</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">match</span></span><span>[</span><span><span class="hljs-number">0</span></span><span>])
    operator = </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">match</span></span><span>[</span><span><span class="hljs-number">1</span></span><span>]
    num2 = </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">int</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">match</span></span><span>[</span><span><span class="hljs-number">2</span></span><span>])
    result = num1 + num2 </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> operator == </span><span><span class="hljs-string">'+'</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">else</span></span><span> num1 - num2
    driver.find_element(By.ID, </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"captcha_answer"</span></span><span>).send_keys(</span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">str</span></span><span>(result))  </span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># Change ID</span></span><span>
</span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">else</span></span><span>:
    </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">print</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"❌ Could not parse CAPTCHA."</span></span><span>)
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">return</span></span><span>
</span></span></code></div></div></pre>

class="whitespace-pre! language-python"><span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">def</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-title function_">login</span></span><span>():
    driver.get(LOGIN_URL)
    time.sleep(</span><span><span class="hljs-number">1</span></span><span>)

    driver.find_element(By.ID, </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"username"</span></span><span>).send_keys(USERNAME)
    driver.find_element(By.ID, </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"password"</span></span><span>).send_keys(PASSWORD)

    </span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># Solve CAPTCHA</span></span><span>
    captcha_text = driver.find_element(By.ID, </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"captcha_question"</span></span><span>).text
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">match</span></span><span> = re.findall(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">r'\d+|\+|\-'</span></span><span>, captcha_text)
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">len</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">match</span></span><span>) == </span><span><span class="hljs-number">3</span></span><span>:
        num1 = </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">int</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">match</span></span><span>[</span><span><span class="hljs-number">0</span></span><span>])
        operator = </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">match</span></span><span>[</span><span><span class="hljs-number">1</span></span><span>]
        num2 = </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">int</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">match</span></span><span>[</span><span><span class="hljs-number">2</span></span><span>])
        result = num1 + num2 </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> operator == </span><span><span class="hljs-string">'+'</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">else</span></span><span> num1 - num2
        driver.find_element(By.ID, </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"captcha_answer"</span></span><span>).send_keys(</span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">str</span></span><span>(result))
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">else</span></span><span>:
        </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">print</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"❌ Could not parse CAPTCHA."</span></span><span>)
        </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">return</span></span><span>

    </span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># Submit</span></span><span>
    driver.find_element(By.ID, </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"login_button"</span></span><span>).click()
    time.sleep(</span><span><span class="hljs-number">2</span></span><span>)
</span></span></code></div></div></pre>
<hr data-start="1596" data-end="1599">
<h3 data-start="1601" data-end="1617">📌 Reminder:</h3>
<p data-start="1618" data-end="1665">Make sure to inspect and <strong data-start="1643" data-end="1664">replace these IDs</strong>:</p>
<ul data-start="1666" data-end="1821">
<li data-start="1666" data-end="1730">
<p data-start="1668" data-end="1730"><code data-start="1668" data-end="1688">"captcha_question"</code> → the element that displays <code data-start="1717" data-end="1730">"5 + 2 = ?"</code></p>
</li>
<li data-start="1731" data-end="1782">
<p data-start="1733" data-end="1782"><code data-start="1733" data-end="1751">"captcha_answer"</code> → the input box for the answer</p>
</li>
<li data-start="1783" data-end="1821">
<p data-start="1785" data-end="1821"><code data-start="1785" data-end="1801">"login_button"</code> → the submit button</p>
</li>
</ul>

<p data-start="369" data-end="384">These give you:</p>
<ul data-start="385" data-end="548">
<li data-start="385" data-end="427">
<p data-start="387" data-end="427"><code data-start="387" data-end="407">webdriver.Chrome()</code> → opens the browser</p>
</li>
<li data-start="428" data-end="485">
<p data-start="430" data-end="485"><code data-start="430" data-end="463">driver.find_element(By.ID, ...)</code> → finds page elements</p>
</li>
<li data-start="486" data-end="548">
<p data-start="488" data-end="548"><code data-start="488" data-end="502">.send_keys()</code>, <code data-start="504" data-end="514">.click()</code> → to interact with fields/buttons</p>
</li>
</ul>
<hr data-start="550" data-end="553">
<p data-start="555" data-end="745">If you’re already running the browser with <code data-start="598" data-end="627">driver = webdriver.Chrome()</code>, you’re good.<br data-start="641" data-end="644">
No new library is needed for the CAPTCHA handling we just added, since the CAPTCHA is <strong data-start="730" data-end="744">text-based</strong>.</p>

right after login.</p></div></div></div></div><div class="flex min-h-[46px] justify-start"><div class="touch:-me-2 touch:-ms-3.5 -ms-2.5 -me-1 flex flex-wrap items-center gap-y-4 p-1 select-none @[64rem]:[--thread-content-max-width:48rem] mx-auto flex max-w-(--thread-content-max-width) flex-1 text-base gap-4 md:gap-5 lg:gap-6 group/turn-messages focus-visible:outline-hidden" bg-token-message-surface rounded-3xl px-5 py-2.5"><div class="whitespace-pre-wrap"># === LOGIN FUNCTION ===
def login():
    driver.get(LOGIN_URL)
    time.sleep(1)
    driver.find_element(By.ID, "username").send_keys(USERNAME)
    driver.find_element(By.ID, "password").send_keys(PASSWORD)

     # Solve CAPTCHA
    captcha_text = driver.find_element(By.ID, "captcha_question").text
    match = re.findall(r'\d+|\+|\-', captcha_text)
    if len(match) == 3:
        num1 = int(match[0])
        operator = match[1]
        num2 = int(match[2])
        result = num1 + num2 if operator == '+' else num1 - num2
        driver.find_element(By.ID, "captcha_answer").send_keys(str(result))
    else:
        print("❌ Could not parse CAPTCHA.")
        return
        
     # Submit
    driver.find_element(By.ID, "login_button").click()
    time.sleep(2)  # Adjust if your site loads slower

class="whitespace-pre! language-python"><span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">def</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-title function_">login</span></span><span>():
    driver.get(LOGIN_URL)
    time.sleep(</span><span><span class="hljs-number">1</span></span><span>)

    driver.find_element(By.ID, </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"username"</span></span><span>).send_keys(USERNAME)
    driver.find_element(By.ID, </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"password"</span></span><span>).send_keys(PASSWORD)

    </span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># --- Solve CAPTCHA ---</span></span><span>
    captcha_text = driver.find_element(By.ID, </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"captcha_question"</span></span><span>).text
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">match</span></span><span> = re.findall(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">r'\d+|\+|\-'</span></span><span>, captcha_text)
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">len</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">match</span></span><span>) == </span><span><span class="hljs-number">3</span></span><span>:
        num1 = </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">int</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">match</span></span><span>[</span><span><span class="hljs-number">0</span></span><span>])
        operator = </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">match</span></span><span>[</span><span><span class="hljs-number">1</span></span><span>]
        num2 = </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">int</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">match</span></span><span>[</span><span><span class="hljs-number">2</span></span><span>])
        result = num1 + num2 </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> operator == </span><span><span class="hljs-string">'+'</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">else</span></span><span> num1 - num2
        driver.find_element(By.ID, </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"captcha_answer"</span></span><span>).send_keys(</span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">str</span></span><span>(result))
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">else</span></span><span>:
        </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">print</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"❌ Could not parse CAPTCHA."</span></span><span>)
        </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">return</span></span><span>

    </span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># --- Submit ---</span></span><span>
    driver.find_element(By.ID, </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"login_button"</span></span><span>).click()
    time.sleep(</span><span><span class="hljs-number">2</span></span><span>)
</span></span></code></div></div></pre>
<hr data-start="1216" data-end="1219">
<h3 data-start="1221" data-end="1246">📌 Checklist for You:</h3>
<ul data-start="1247" data-end="1417">
<li data-start="1247" data-end="1288">
<p data-start="1249" data-end="1288">✅ <code data-start="1251" data-end="1262">import re</code> at the top of your script</p>
</li>
<li data-start="1289" data-end="1381">
<p data-start="1291" data-end="1312">✅ Confirm real <code data-start="1306" data-end="1310">ID</code>s:</p>
<ul data-start="1315" data-end="1381">
<li data-start="1315" data-end="1337">
<p data-start="1317" data-end="1337"><code data-start="1317" data-end="1337">"captcha_question"</code></p>
</li>
<li data-start="1340" data-end="1360">
<p data-start="1342" data-end="1360"><code data-start="1342" data-end="1360">"captcha_answer"</code></p>
</li>

<p data-start="1365" data-end="1381"><code data-start="1365" data-end="1381">"login_button"</code></p>
</li>
</ul>
</li>

<p data-start="1384" data-end="1417">✅ Works inside your Selenium flow</p>
</li>

<h3 data-start="182" data-end="214">🔍 How to Find the Real IDs:</h3>
<ol data-start="216" data-end="503">
<li data-start="216" data-end="270">
<p data-start="219" data-end="270"><strong data-start="219" data-end="270">Open the reservation/login page in your browser</strong></p>
</li>
<li data-start="271" data-end="328">
<p data-start="274" data-end="328"><strong data-start="274" data-end="289">Right-click</strong> the element (e.g., the username field)</p>
</li>
<li data-start="329" data-end="351">
<p data-start="332" data-end="351">Click <strong data-start="338" data-end="351">“Inspect”</strong></p>
</li>
<li data-start="352" data-end="451">
<p data-start="355" data-end="379">Look for something like:</p>

</li>
<li data-start="452" data-end="503">
<p data-start="455" data-end="503">Use the <code data-start="463" data-end="473">id="..."</code> or <code data-start="477" data-end="489">name="..."</code> in your code.</p>

</ol>

<p data-start="120" data-end="265">So both <code data-start="128" data-end="143">name="txtusv"</code> and <code data-start="148" data-end="161">id="txtusv"</code> are available — ✅ <strong data-start="180" data-end="200">either one works</strong>, but using <code data-start="212" data-end="216">id</code> is usually faster and more reliable in Selenium.</p>

# === LOGIN FUNCTION ===
def login():
    driver.get(LOGIN_URL)
    time.sleep(1)

    
    driver.find_element(By.ID, "txtusv").send_keys(USERNAME)
    driver.find_element(By.ID, "passv").send_keys(PASSWORD)

     # Solve CAPTCHA
    captcha_text = driver.find_element(By.ID, "lbcode").text
    match = re.findall(r'\d+|\+|\-', captcha_text)
    if len(match) == 3:
        num1 = int(match[0])
        operator = match[1]
        num2 = int(match[2])
        result = num1 + num2 if operator == '+' else num1 - num2
        driver.find_element(By.ID, "txtcode").send_keys(str(result))
    else:
        print("❌ Could not parse CAPTCHA.")
        return
        
     # Submit
    driver.find_element(By.ID, "btlogin").click()
    time.sleep(2)  # Adjust if your site loads slower

4.04235 18.0962 4.40306 18.1289 4.80371C18.1657 5.25395 18.165 5.81091 18.165 6.5V9.33301Z"></path></svg>Copy code</button></div></div></div><div class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="whitespace-pre! language-python"><span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">def</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-title function_">login</span></span><span>():
    driver.get(LOGIN_URL)
    time.sleep(</span><span><span class="hljs-number">1</span></span><span>)

    </span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># --- Fill in login form ---</span></span><span>
    driver.find_element(By.ID, </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"txtusv"</span></span><span>).send_keys(USERNAME)      </span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># Username field</span></span><span>
    driver.find_element(By.ID, </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"passv"</span></span><span>).send_keys(PASSWORD)       </span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># Password field</span></span><span>

    </span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># --- Solve CAPTCHA ---</span></span><span>
    captcha_text = driver.find_element(By.ID, </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"lbcode"</span></span><span>).text      </span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># e.g., "7 + 3 ="</span></span><span>
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">match</span></span><span> = re.findall(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">r'\d+|\+|\-'</span></span><span>, captcha_text)
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">len</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">match</span></span><span>) == </span><span><span class="hljs-number">3</span></span><span>:
        num1 = </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">int</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">match</span></span><span>[</span><span><span class="hljs-number">0</span></span><span>])
        operator = </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">match</span></span><span>[</span><span><span class="hljs-number">1</span></span><span>]
        num2 = </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">int</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">match</span></span><span>[</span><span><span class="hljs-number">2</span></span><span>])
        result = num1 + num2 </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> operator == </span><span><span class="hljs-string">'+'</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">else</span></span><span> num1 - num2
        driver.find_element(By.ID, </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"txtcode"</span></span><span>).send_keys(</span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">str</span></span><span>(result))  </span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># Captcha answer</span></span><span>
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">else</span></span><span>:
        </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">print</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"❌ Could not parse CAPTCHA."</span></span><span>)
        </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">return</span></span><span>

    </span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># --- Submit login form ---</span></span><span>
    driver.find_element(By.ID, </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"btlogin"</span></span><span>).click()
    time.sleep(</span><span><span class="hljs-number">2</span></span><span>)
</span></span></code></div></div></pre>

data-scroll-anchor="false"><h6 class="sr-only">ChatGPT said:</h6><div class="text-base my-auto mx-auto py-5 [--thread-content-margin:--spacing(4)] @[37rem]:[--thread-content-margin:--spacing(6)] @[72rem]:[--thread-content-margin:--spacing(16)] px-(--thread-content-margin)"><div class="[--thread-content-max-width:32rem] @[34rem]:[--thread-content-max-width:40rem] @[64rem]:[--thread-content-max-width:48rem] mx-auto flex max-w-(--thread-content-max-width) flex-1 text-base gap-4 md:gap-5 lg:gap-6 group/turn-messages focus-visible:outline-hidden" tabindex="-1"><div class="group/conversation-turn relative flex w-full min-w-0 flex-col agent-turn"><div class="relative flex-col gap-1 md:gap-3"><div class="flex max-w-full flex-col grow"><div data-message-author-role="assistant" data-message-id="44e9e413-5431-4492-9418-a04f60f45dd6" dir="auto" class="min-h-8 text-message relative flex w-full flex-col items-end gap-2 text-start break-words whitespace-normal [.text-message+&amp;]:mt-5" data-message-model-slug="gpt-4o"><div class="flex w-full flex-col gap-1 empty:hidden first:pt-[3px]"><div class="markdown prose dark:prose-invert w-full break-words dark"><p data-start="0" data-end="152">Whoa — sounds like the page might be <strong data-start="37" data-end="85">blocked, misloaded, or being auto-redirected</strong> due to automation detection or timing issues. Let's break it down:</p>
<hr data-start="154" data-end="157">
<h3 data-start="159" data-end="183">🔍 Possible Reasons:</h3>
<ol data-start="184" data-end="726">
<li data-start="184" data-end="305">
<p data-start="187" data-end="305"><strong data-start="187" data-end="210">Page Load Too Early</strong><br data-start="210" data-end="213">
Maybe it’s not yet open for booking, or you're accessing before their server is fully up.</p>
</li>
<li data-start="310" data-end="426">
<p data-start="313" data-end="426"><strong data-start="313" data-end="344">Selenium Triggered Anti-Bot</strong><br data-start="344" data-end="347">
Some websites detect Selenium automation and <strong data-start="395" data-end="425">serve a blank or fake page</strong>.</p>
</li>
<li data-start="428" data-end="599">
<p data-start="431" data-end="599"><strong data-start="431" data-end="462">JS-Heavy or Delayed Content</strong><br data-start="462" data-end="465">
If the site loads via JavaScript (SPA), you might need to wait longer or use <code data-start="545" data-end="570">driver.execute_script()</code> to scroll or trigger things.</p>
</li>
<li data-start="601" data-end="726">
<p data-start="604" data-end="726"><strong data-start="604" data-end="631">Wrong URL / Redirection</strong><br data-start="631" data-end="634">
If the site redirects to a login or maintenance page, you might end up seeing just white.</p>
</li>
</ol>
<hr data-start="728" data-end="731">
<h3 data-start="733" data-end="754">✅ Steps to Debug:</h3>
<h4 data-start="756" data-end="805">🔹 1. Open the page manually in your browser</h4>
<ul data-start="806" data-end="830">
<li data-start="806" data-end="830">
<p data-start="808" data-end="830">Does it work normally?</p>
</li>
</ul>
<h4 data-start="832" data-end="879">🔹 2. Add a screenshot command in Selenium</h4>
<p data-start="880" data-end="919">Add this right after <code data-start="901" data-end="918">.get(LOGIN_URL)</code>:</p>

<h4 data-start="1024" data-end="1063">🔹 3. Try with <code data-start="1044" data-end="1054">headless</code> disabled</h4>
<p data-start="1064" data-end="1127">If you're running in headless mode, <strong data-start="1100" data-end="1118">comment it out</strong> for now:</p>

<p data-start="1283" data-end="1354">If it's empty or a single <code data-start="1309" data-end="1324">&lt;html&gt;&lt;/html&gt;</code>, the page really didn't load.</p>
<hr data-start="1356" data-end="1359">

data-scroll-anchor="false"><h6 class="sr-only">ChatGPT said:</h6><div class="text-base my-auto mx-auto py-5 [--thread-content-margin:--spacing(4)] @[37rem]:[--thread-content-margin:--spacing(6)] @[72rem]:[--thread-content-margin:--spacing(16)] px-(--thread-content-margin)"><div class="[--thread-content-max-width:32rem] @[34rem]:[--thread-content-max-width:40rem] @[64rem]:[--thread-content-max-width:48rem] mx-auto flex max-w-(--thread-content-max-width) flex-1 text-base gap-4 md:gap-5 lg:gap-6 group/turn-messages focus-visible:outline-hidden" tabindex="-1"><div class="group/conversation-turn relative flex w-full min-w-0 flex-col agent-turn"><div class="relative flex-col gap-1 md:gap-3"><div class="flex max-w-full flex-col grow"><div data-message-author-role="assistant" data-message-id="afd6fd3c-789a-4bd2-948a-1999045b31c5" dir="auto" class="min-h-8 text-message relative flex w-full flex-col items-end gap-2 text-start break-words whitespace-normal [.text-message+&amp;]:mt-5" data-message-model-slug="gpt-4-1-mini"><div class="flex w-full flex-col gap-1 empty:hidden first:pt-[3px]"><div class="markdown prose dark:prose-invert w-full break-words dark"><p data-start="0" data-end="152">Good point — yes, <strong data-start="18" data-end="74">changing the IDs alone should NOT cause a white page</strong> because <code data-start="83" data-end="97">find_element</code> errors just throw exceptions but don’t blank the page.</p>
<hr data-start="154" data-end="157">
<h3 data-start="159" data-end="186">What probably happened:</h3>
<ul data-start="188" data-end="536">
<li data-start="188" data-end="304">
<p data-start="190" data-end="304">If your script runs and <strong data-start="214" data-end="255">tries to find elements with wrong IDs</strong>, Selenium raises a <strong data-start="275" data-end="303"><code data-start="277" data-end="301">NoSuchElementException</code></strong>.</p>
</li>
<li data-start="305" data-end="422">
<p data-start="307" data-end="422">But <strong data-start="311" data-end="352">that won’t cause a white page to load</strong> — the browser still opens the URL, but your script may crash or stop.</p>
</li>
<li data-start="423" data-end="536">
<p data-start="425" data-end="536">If you saw a white page <strong data-start="449" data-end="477">right after changing IDs</strong>, it might be a coincidence or something else triggered it.</p>
</li>
</ul>
<hr data-start="538" data-end="541">
<h3 data-start="543" data-end="565">Two possibilities:</h3>
<ol data-start="567" data-end="722">
<li data-start="567" data-end="650">
<p data-start="570" data-end="650"><strong data-start="570" data-end="603">You changed the URL or timing</strong> (like opening the page too early or wrong URL)</p>
</li>
<li data-start="651" data-end="722">
<p data-start="654" data-end="722"><strong data-start="654" data-end="722">The website detects the automated browser and blocks the content</strong></p>
</li>
</ol>
<hr data-start="724" data-end="727">
<h3 data-start="729" data-end="744">To confirm:</h3>
<ul data-start="746" data-end="804">
<li data-start="746" data-end="804">
<p data-start="748" data-end="804">Run this minimal code (replace URL with your LOGIN_URL):</p>
</li>
</ul>

<h3 data-start="1142" data-end="1154">Summary:</h3>
<ul data-start="1155" data-end="1285">
<li data-start="1155" data-end="1206">
<p data-start="1157" data-end="1206">The <strong data-start="1161" data-end="1206">IDs themselves don’t cause the white page</strong></p>
</li>

data-scroll-anchor="false"><h6 class="sr-only">ChatGPT said:</h6><div class="text-base my-auto mx-auto py-5 [--thread-content-margin:--spacing(4)] @[37rem]:[--thread-content-margin:--spacing(6)] @[72rem]:[--thread-content-margin:--spacing(16)] px-(--thread-content-margin)"><div class="[--thread-content-max-width:32rem] @[34rem]:[--thread-content-max-width:40rem] @[64rem]:[--thread-content-max-width:48rem] mx-auto flex max-w-(--thread-content-max-width) flex-1 text-base gap-4 md:gap-5 lg:gap-6 group/turn-messages focus-visible:outline-hidden" data-message-author-role="assistant" data-message-id="b5a9dd30-251a-4eec-9002-1dcb0bb426a0" dir="auto" class="min-h-8 text-message relative flex w-full flex-col items-end gap-2 text-start break-words whitespace-normal [.text-message+&amp;]:mt-5" data-message-model-slug="gpt-4o"><div class="flex w-full flex-col gap-1 empty:hidden first:pt-[3px]"><div class="markdown prose dark:prose-invert w-full break-words dark"><p data-start="0" data-end="106">💯 <strong data-start="3" data-end="24">Yes, very likely.</strong><br data-start="24" data-end="27">
If the site opens at 7:00 AM and you're trying to load it at <strong data-start="88" data-end="99">6:00 AM</strong>, then:</p>
<hr data-start="108" data-end="111">
<h3 data-start="113" data-end="133">🔥 What Happens:</h3>
<ul data-start="134" data-end="374">
<li data-start="134" data-end="189">
<p data-start="136" data-end="189">The site may <strong data-start="149" data-end="189">not allow access before opening time</strong></p>
</li>
<li data-start="190" data-end="294">
<p data-start="192" data-end="294">It could show a <strong data-start="208" data-end="228">blank/white page</strong>, a <strong data-start="232" data-end="252">“closed” message</strong>, or just not load its JavaScript elements</p>
</li>
<li data-start="295" data-end="374">
<p data-start="297" data-end="374">Your Selenium bot sees a blank page because <strong data-start="341" data-end="374">there’s nothing to render yet</strong></p>
</li>
</ul>
<hr data-start="376" data-end="379">
<h3 data-start="381" data-end="402">✅ How to Confirm:</h3>
<p data-start="403" data-end="468">Try opening the same URL <strong data-start="428" data-end="467">manually in your browser at 6:00 AM</strong>:</p>
<ul data-start="469" data-end="572">
<li data-start="469" data-end="511">
<p data-start="471" data-end="511">Do you also get a blank or minimal page?</p>
</li>
<li data-start="512" data-end="572">
<p data-start="514" data-end="572">Then yes, the site is likely not open for interaction yet.</p>
</li>
</ul>
<hr data-start="574" data-end="577">
<h3 data-start="579" data-end="596">✅ What To Do:</h3>
<ol data-start="597" data-end="922">
<li data-start="597" data-end="808">
<p data-start="600" data-end="629"><strong data-start="600" data-end="629">Adjust your <code data-start="614" data-end="627">TARGET_TIME</code></strong></p>
<ul data-start="633" data-end="808">
<li data-start="633" data-end="714">
<p data-start="635" data-end="714">Set it to something like <code data-start="660" data-end="672">"06:59:58"</code> (a few seconds before the real open time)</p>
</li>
<li data-start="718" data-end="808">
<p data-start="720" data-end="808">This way, the site will be <strong data-start="747" data-end="765">live and ready</strong>, and your bot will act in the first second</p>
</li>
</ul>
</li>
<li data-start="810" data-end="922">
<p data-start="813" data-end="842"><strong data-start="813" data-end="842">Don’t open the site early</strong></p>
<ul data-start="846" data-end="922">
<li data-start="846" data-end="922">
<p data-start="848" data-end="922">Let the script <strong data-start="863" data-end="871">wait</strong> until that exact time, then call <code data-start="905" data-end="922">driver.get(...)</code></p>
</li>
</ul>
</li>
</ol>
<hr data-start="924" data-end="927">

</span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># while True:</span></span><span>

</span></span></code></div></div></pre>
<p data-start="442" data-end="520">Then run your script <strong data-start="463" data-end="479">manually now</strong>, during a time when the site is working.</p>
<hr data-start="522" data-end="525">
<h3 data-start="527" data-end="556">✅ What You Should Expect:</h3>
<ul data-start="557" data-end="698">
<li data-start="557" data-end="576">
<p data-start="559" data-end="576">The browser opens</p>
</li>
<li data-start="577" data-end="604">
<p data-start="579" data-end="604">Fills username &amp; password</p>
</li>
<li data-start="605" data-end="625">
<p data-start="607" data-end="625">Solves the CAPTCHA</p>
</li>
<li data-start="626" data-end="635">
<p data-start="628" data-end="635">Logs in</p>
</li>
<li data-start="636" data-end="698">
<p data-start="638" data-end="698">Optionally prints/logs something or goes to reservation page</p>
</li>
</ul>
<hr data-start="700" data-end="703">
<p data-start="705" data-end="820">Once that works perfectly, you can re-enable the <code data-start="754" data-end="767">TARGET_TIME</code> wait and set it just before the real booking window.</p>

<h3 data-start="207" data-end="228">🔎 What Happened:</h3>
<ul data-start="229" data-end="497">
<li data-start="229" data-end="277">
<p data-start="231" data-end="277">✅ Chrome opened (proof: DevTools URL appeared)</p>
</li>
<li data-start="278" data-end="384">
<p data-start="280" data-end="384">❌ Crashed quickly — most likely due to <code data-start="319" data-end="343">NoSuchElementException</code> or a failed <code data-start="356" data-end="366">.click()</code> or <code data-start="370" data-end="384">.send_keys()</code></p>
</li>
<li data-start="385" data-end="497">
<p data-start="387" data-end="497">❌ You didn’t see <code data-start="404" data-end="413">print()</code> messages — probably because the crash happened <strong data-start="461" data-end="481">before or during</strong> CAPTCHA solving</p>
</li>
</ul>
<hr data-start="499" data-end="502">
<h3 data-start="504" data-end="569">✅ Fix: Add Logging and Error Handling to Catch What’s Failing</h3>
<p data-start="571" data-end="644">Update your code like this to <strong data-start="601" data-end="617">print errors</strong> and <strong data-start="622" data-end="643">pause before exit</strong>:</p>
<pre class="overflow-visible!" data-start="646" data-end="1949"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-2xl relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary"><div class="flex items-center class="whitespace-pre! language-python"><span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">from</span></span><span> selenium.common.exceptions </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">import</span></span><span> NoSuchElementException
</span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">import</span></span><span> traceback

</span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">def</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-title function_">login</span></span><span>():
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">try</span></span><span>:
        driver.get(LOGIN_URL)
        time.sleep(</span><span><span class="hljs-number">2</span></span><span>)

        </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">print</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"🔐 Filling credentials..."</span></span><span>)
        driver.find_element(By.ID, </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"txtusv"</span></span><span>).send_keys(USERNAME)
        driver.find_element(By.ID, </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"passv"</span></span><span>).send_keys(PASSWORD)

        </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">print</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"🧠 Solving CAPTCHA..."</span></span><span>)
        captcha_text = driver.find_element(By.ID, </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"lbcode"</span></span><span>).text
        </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">match</span></span><span> = re.findall(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">r'\d+|\+|\-'</span></span><span>, captcha_text)
        </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">len</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">match</span></span><span>) == </span><span><span class="hljs-number">3</span></span><span>:
            num1 = </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">int</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">match</span></span><span>[</span><span><span class="hljs-number">0</span></span><span>])
            operator = </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">match</span></span><span>[</span><span><span class="hljs-number">1</span></span><span>]
            num2 = </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">int</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">match</span></span><span>[</span><span><span class="hljs-number">2</span></span><span>])
            result = num1 + num2 </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> operator == </span><span><span class="hljs-string">'+'</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">else</span></span><span> num1 - num2
            driver.find_element(By.ID, </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"txtcode"</span></span><span>).send_keys(</span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">str</span></span><span>(result))
        </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">else</span></span><span>:
            </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">print</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"❌ CAPTCHA parse failed."</span></span><span>)
            </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">return</span></span><span>

        </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">print</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"🚀 Submitting form..."</span></span><span>)
        driver.find_element(By.ID, </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"btlogin"</span></span><span>).click()
        time.sleep(</span><span><span class="hljs-number">3</span></span><span>)

        </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">print</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"✅ Login attempt complete."</span></span><span>)

    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">except</span></span><span> NoSuchElementException </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">as</span></span><span> e:
        </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">print</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"❌ Element not found:"</span></span><span>, e)
        traceback.print_exc()
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">except</span></span><span> Exception </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">as</span></span><span> e:
        </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">print</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"💥 Unexpected error:"</span></span><span>, e)
        traceback.print_exc()
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">finally</span></span><span>:
        </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">input</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"🔚 Press Enter to close browser..."</span></span><span>)
        driver.quit()
</span></span></code></div></div></pre>
<hr data-start="1951" data-end="1954">
<h3 data-start="1956" data-end="1980">🔎 Now When You Run:</h3>
<ul data-start="1981" data-end="2274">
<li data-start="1981" data-end="2079">
<p data-start="1983" data-end="2012">You’ll see debug prints like:</p>
<ul data-start="2015" data-end="2079">
<li data-start="2015" data-end="2079">
<p data-start="2017" data-end="2079"><code data-start="2017" data-end="2046">"🔐 Filling credentials..."</code>, <code data-start="2048" data-end="2073">"🧠 Solving CAPTCHA..."</code>, etc.</p>
</li>
</ul>
</li>
<li data-start="2080" data-end="2161">
<p data-start="2082" data-end="2161">If something breaks (wrong ID, element not loaded, etc.) — the error will print</p>
</li>
<li data-start="2162" data-end="2274">
<p data-start="2164" data-end="2274">The browser <strong data-start="2176" data-end="2196">won’t auto-close</strong> — it waits for you to press Enter so you can <strong data-start="2242" data-end="2274">see the page and what failed</strong></p>
</li>
</ul>
<hr data-start="2276" data-end="2279">

<p data-start="644" data-end="776">➡️ If Google opens and stays, the problem is with your university site<br data-start="714" data-end="717">
❌ If even Google crashes → it's a <strong data-start="751" data-end="776">Selenium/Chrome issue</strong></p>
<hr data-start="778" data-end="781">
<h3 data-start="783" data-end="830">🔍 2. <strong data-start="793" data-end="830">Run Chrome with GUI (No headless)</strong></h3>
<p data-start="831" data-end="869">Make sure your options look like this:</p>

<p data-start="1457" data-end="1472">And test again.</p>

</span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># Wait before closing</span></span><span>

<h3 data-start="660" data-end="681">🔍 What to Check:</h3>
<ul data-start="682" data-end="919">
<li data-start="682" data-end="716">
<p data-start="684" data-end="716">✅ Chrome <strong data-start="693" data-end="716">should open visibly</strong></p>
</li>
<li data-start="717" data-end="743">
<p data-start="719" data-end="743">✅ Google.com should load</p>
</li>
<li data-start="744" data-end="797">
<p data-start="746" data-end="797">✅ <code data-start="748" data-end="765">google_test.png</code> should show the Google homepage</p>
</li>
<li data-start="798" data-end="919">
<p data-start="800" data-end="919">🛑 If it still crashes instantly, then the issue is <strong data-start="852" data-end="885">ChromeDriver version mismatch</strong>, or a deeper browser config issue</p>
</li>
</ul>

data-scroll-anchor="false"><h6 class="sr-only">ChatGPT said:</h6><div class="text-base my-auto mx-auto py-5 [--thread-content-margin:--spacing(4)] @[37rem]:[--thread-content-margin:--spacing(6)] @[72rem]:[--thread-content-margin:--spacing(16)] px-(--thread-content-margin)"><div class="[--thread-content-max-width:32rem] @[34rem]:[--thread-content-max-width:40rem] @[64rem]:[--thread-content-max-width:48rem] mx-auto flex max-w-(--thread-content-max-width) flex-1 text-base gap-4 md:gap-5 lg:gap-6 group/turn-messages focus-visible:outline-hidden" tabindex="-1"><div class="group/conversation-turn relative flex w-full min-w-0 flex-col agent-turn"><div class="relative flex-col gap-1 md:gap-3"><div class="flex max-w-full flex-col grow"><div data-message-author-role="assistant" data-message-id="1d9e5f66-6361-44ee-8949-9d55e33f1367" dir="auto" class="min-h-8 text-message relative flex w-full flex-col items-end gap-2 text-start break-words whitespace-normal [.text-message+&amp;]:mt-5" data-message-model-slug="gpt-4o"><div class="flex w-full flex-col gap-1 empty:hidden first:pt-[3px]"><div class="markdown prose dark:prose-invert w-full break-words dark"><p data-start="0" data-end="262">Boom 💥 we’re getting closer!<br data-start="29" data-end="32">
<strong data-start="32" data-end="95">Google opened = your Chrome + undetected-chromedriver work.</strong><br data-start="95" data-end="98">
But that <strong data-start="107" data-end="156"><code data-start="109" data-end="154">OSError: [WinError 6] The handle is invalid</code></strong> means something in your Python environment (usually the terminal) is messing with <code data-start="239" data-end="248">input()</code> or <code data-start="252" data-end="261">print()</code>.</p>
<hr data-start="264" data-end="267">
<h3 data-start="269" data-end="299">🔎 Why This Error Happens:</h3>
<ul data-start="300" data-end="532">
<li data-start="300" data-end="455">
<p data-start="302" data-end="455">You're using <strong data-start="315" data-end="328"><code data-start="317" data-end="326">input()</code></strong> inside an environment that doesn’t support it properly (e.g., running from <strong data-start="404" data-end="414">VSCode</strong>, PyCharm console, or certain schedulers)</p>
</li>
<li data-start="456" data-end="532">
<p data-start="458" data-end="532">It can't handle reading from the console (WinError 6 = invalid I/O handle)</p>
</li>
</ul>
<hr data-start="534" data-end="537">
<h3 data-start="539" data-end="579">✅ Solution: Remove <code data-start="562" data-end="571">input()</code> for now</h3>
<p data-start="581" data-end="603">Just comment this out:</p>
<pre class="overflow-visible!" data-start="604" data-end="709"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-2xl relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary"><div class="flex items-center time.sleep(</span><span><span class="hljs-number">5</span></span><span>)  </span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># instead, wait before quitting</span></span><span>
</span></span></code></div></div></pre>
<p data-start="711" data-end="725">So final code:</p>

</span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">import</span></span><span> time

driver = uc.Chrome()

<hr data-start="953" data-end="956">

break-words dark"><p data-start="0" data-end="196">💥 Okay — now we know <strong data-start="22" data-end="73">WinError 6 is persistent even without <code data-start="62" data-end="71">input()</code></strong>, which is uncommon but solvable. It typically happens on <strong data-start="131" data-end="195">Windows when running Python in certain terminal environments</strong>.</p>
<p data-start="198" data-end="233">Let’s kill this issue step-by-step:</p>
<hr data-start="235" data-end="238">
<h3 data-start="240" data-end="266">✅ First, Confirm This:</h3>
<p data-start="267" data-end="417">Does the error still show <strong data-start="293" data-end="328">after Google loads successfully</strong>?<br data-start="329" data-end="332">
If yes → then the crash is <strong data-start="359" data-end="379">not in <code data-start="368" data-end="377">input()</code></strong>, but probably in something else like:</p>
<ul data-start="418" data-end="514">
<li data-start="418" data-end="451">
<p data-start="420" data-end="451">A <code data-start="422" data-end="431">print()</code> being flushed wrong</p>
</li>
<li data-start="452" data-end="514">
<p data-start="454" data-end="514">Selenium or <code data-start="466" data-end="479">uc.Chrome()</code> trying to write to a closed handle</p>
</li>
</ul>
<hr data-start="516" data-end="519">
<h3 data-start="521" data-end="547">🔧 Step-by-Step Fixes:</h3>
<h4 data-start="549" data-end="610">🔹 1. Use <code data-start="564" data-end="579">try...finally</code> with no <code data-start="588" data-end="597">input()</code>, just delay:</h4>

class="whitespace-pre! language-python"><span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">import</span></span><span> undetected_chromedriver </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">as</span></span><span> uc
</span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">import</span></span><span> time

</span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">try</span></span><span>:
    driver = uc.Chrome()
    driver.get(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"https://www.google.com"</span></span><span>)
    time.sleep(</span><span><span class="hljs-number">3</span></span><span>)
    driver.save_screenshot(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"google_test.png"</span></span><span>)
    </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">print</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"✅ Opened and screenshot saved."</span></span><span>)
    time.sleep(</span><span><span class="hljs-number">5</span></span><span>)  </span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># Let you see the result</span></span><span>
</span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">finally</span></span><span>:
    driver.quit()
</span></span></code></div></div></pre>
<p data-start="926" data-end="976">❗️<strong data-start="928" data-end="959">If you still get WinError 6</strong>, continue below.</p>
<hr data-start="978" data-end="981">
<h4 data-start="983" data-end="1031">🔹 2. Try Running from a Different Terminal</h4>
<p data-start="1032" data-end="1078">This is often a <strong data-start="1048" data-end="1072">console-specific bug</strong>. Try:</p>
<ul data-start="1080" data-end="1254">
<li data-start="1080" data-end="1129">
<p data-start="1082" data-end="1129">🟢 Run the script from <strong data-start="1105" data-end="1112">CMD</strong> (Command Prompt)</p>
</li>
<li data-start="1130" data-end="1157">
<p data-start="1132" data-end="1157">🔵 Or from <strong data-start="1143" data-end="1157">PowerShell</strong></p>
</li>
<li data-start="1158" data-end="1213">
<p data-start="1160" data-end="1213">🔴 If using <strong data-start="1172" data-end="1182">VSCode</strong>, open an <strong data-start="1192" data-end="1213">external terminal</strong></p>
</li>
<li data-start="1214" data-end="1254">
<p data-start="1216" data-end="1254">Avoid: IDLE or weird GUI-based runners</p>
</li>
</ul>
<hr data-start="1256" data-end="1259">
<h4 data-start="1261" data-end="1315">🔹 3. Suppress all <code data-start="1285" data-end="1294">print()</code> (just test silently)</h4>

<p data-start="1523" data-end="1588">If that works → the error was in I/O (like printing or inputting)</p>
<hr data-start="1590" data-end="1593">
<h4 data-start="1595" data-end="1644">🔹 4. Upgrade/Reinstall Python (last resort)</h4>
<p data-start="1645" data-end="1662">If nothing works:</p>
<ul data-start="1663" data-end="1771">
<li data-start="1663" data-end="1698">
<p data-start="1665" data-end="1698">Make sure your Python is <strong data-start="1690" data-end="1698">3.9+</strong></p>
</li>
<li data-start="1699" data-end="1771">
<p data-start="1701" data-end="1771">Reinstall from <a data-start="1716" data-end="1771" rel="noopener" target="_new" class="" href="https://www.python.org/downloads/windows/">python.org</a></p>
</li>
</ul>

<h3 data-start="133" data-end="161">✅ Steps to Run from CMD:</h3>
<ol data-start="163" data-end="408">
<li data-start="163" data-end="208">
<p data-start="166" data-end="208">Press <code data-start="172" data-end="181">Win + R</code>, type <code data-start="188" data-end="193">cmd</code>, and hit Enter</p>
</li>
<li data-start="209" data-end="344">
<p data-start="212" data-end="245">Navigate to your script's folder:</p>

dir="auto" data-testid="conversation-turn-46" data-scroll-anchor="false"><h6 class="sr-only">ChatGPT said:</h6><div class="text-base my-auto mx-auto py-5 [--thread-content-margin:--spacing(4)] @[37rem]:[--thread-content-margin:--spacing(6)] @[72rem]:[--thread-content-margin:--spacing(16)] px-(--thread-content-margin)"><div class="[--thread-content-max-width:32rem] @[34rem]:[--thread-content-max-width:40rem] @[64rem]:[--thread-content-max-width:48rem] mx-auto flex max-w-(--thread-content-max-width) flex-1 text-base gap-4 md:gap-5 lg:gap-6 group/turn-messages max-w-full flex-col grow"><div data-message-author-role="assistant" data-message-id="a695abb8-f883-46fe-87ce-fdc594966c89" dir="auto" class="min-h-8 text-message relative flex w-full flex-col items-end gap-2 text-start break-words whitespace-normal [.text-message+&amp;]:mt-5" data-message-model-slug="gpt-4o"><div class="flex w-full flex-col gap-1 empty:hidden first:pt-[3px]"><div class="markdown prose dark:prose-invert w-full break-words dark"><p data-start="0" data-end="225">💥 Got it — that confirms the issue is <strong data-start="39" data-end="61">not with your code</strong>, but with how <strong data-start="76" data-end="139"><code data-start="78" data-end="103">undetected-chromedriver</code> interacts with I/O on your system</strong> — specifically <strong data-start="155" data-end="224">with <code data-start="162" data-end="174">sys.stdout</code> or <code data-start="178" data-end="190">sys.stderr</code> handles being closed or invalid</strong>.</p>
<p data-start="227" data-end="285">It’s rare but known on <strong data-start="250" data-end="267">Windows + CMD</strong>, especially when:</p>
<ul data-start="287" data-end="397">
<li data-start="287" data-end="342">
<p data-start="289" data-end="342">You’re using older versions of Python or ChromeDriver</p>
</li>
<li data-start="343" data-end="397">
<p data-start="345" data-end="397">Or <code data-start="348" data-end="357">print()</code> internally crashes due to a closed pipe</p>
</li>
</ul>
<hr data-start="399" data-end="402">
<h3 data-start="404" data-end="463">✅ Guaranteed Fix: Force <code data-start="432" data-end="440">stdout</code> and <code data-start="445" data-end="453">stderr</code> to behave</h3>
<p data-start="465" data-end="541">Add these two lines <strong data-start="485" data-end="504">at the very top</strong> of your script (even above imports):</p>
<pre class="overflow-visible!" data-start="542" data-end="640"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-2xl relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary"><div class="flex items-center sys.stderr = </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">open</span></span><span>(os.devnull, </span><span><span class="hljs-string">'w'</span></span><span>)
</span></span></code></div></div></pre>
<p data-start="642" data-end="771">💡 This disables all <code data-start="663" data-end="672">print()</code> and error output — but it <strong data-start="699" data-end="735">completely avoids the WinError 6</strong> by redirecting output to “nowhere”.</p>
<hr data-start="773" data-end="776">

sys.stdout = </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">open</span></span><span>(os.devnull, </span><span><span class="hljs-string">'w'</span></span><span>)
sys.stderr = </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">open</span></span><span>(os.devnull, </span><span><span class="hljs-string">'w'</span></span><span>)

</span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">import</span></span><span> undetected_chromedriver </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">as</span></span><span> uc
</span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">import</span></span><span> time

driver = uc.Chrome()
driver.get(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"https://www.google.com"</span></span><span>)
time.sleep(</span><span><span class="hljs-number">3</span></span><span>)
driver.save_screenshot(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"google_test.png"</span></span><span>)
time.sleep(</span><span><span class="hljs-number">5</span></span><span>)
driver.quit()
</span></span></code></div></div></pre>
<hr data-start="1094" data-end="1097">
<h3 data-start="1099" data-end="1138">🔍 If You Want to Still See Output:</h3>
<p data-start="1139" data-end="1185">You can <strong data-start="1147" data-end="1164">log to a file</strong> instead of printing:</p>
<pre class="overflow-visible!" data-start="1186" data-end="1257"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-2xl relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary"><div class="flex items-center text-token-text-secondary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between h-9 bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary select-none rounded-t-2xl">python</div><div class="sticky top-9"><div class="absolute end-0 bottom-0 flex h-9 items-center pe-2"><div class="bg-token-bg-elevated-secondary text-token-text-secondary flex items-center gap-4 rounded-sm px-2 font-sans text-xs"><button class="flex gap-1 class="whitespace-pre! language-python"><span><span>sys.stdout = </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">open</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"log.txt"</span></span><span>, </span></span></code></div></div></pre>
<p data-start="1259" data-end="1293">Then read <code data-start="1269" data-end="1278">log.txt</code> after the run.</p>
<hr data-start="1295" data-end="1298">
<h3 data-start="1300" data-end="1322">🧠 What This Means</h3>
<ul data-start="1323" data-end="1476">
<li data-start="1323" data-end="1412">
<p data-start="1325" data-end="1412">Your system’s <code data-start="1339" data-end="1347">stdout</code> handle is in an invalid state (common in some Python/CMD setups)</p>
</li>
<li data-start="1413" data-end="1476">
<p data-start="1415" data-end="1476">This redirect neutralizes it and lets the script run normally</p>
</li>
</ul>
<hr data-start="1478" data-end="1481">
